option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@android:color/white" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp">
<!-- Header --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="64dp" android:layout_height="64dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#E3F2FD" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="0dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_input_add" android:contentDescription="@string/app_name" app:tint="#2196F3" /> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="프로젝트 정보 입력" android:textColor="#212121" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:text="분석할 프로젝트나 아이디어를\n자세히 설명해주세요" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="14sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Project Title --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/til_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:hint="프로젝트 제목 *" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="8dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="8dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="8dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="8dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="text" android:maxLines="2" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Project Description --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/til_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:hint="프로젝트 설명 *" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="8dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="8dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="8dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="8dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="top" android:inputType="textMultiLine" android:minHeight="120dp" android:maxLines="6" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Project Budget --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/til_budget" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:hint="예상 예산 (만원) *" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="8dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="8dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="8dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="8dp" app:prefixText="₩ " app:suffixText="만원">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_budget" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="numberDecimal" android:maxLines="1" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Info Card --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#E3F2FD" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="0dp" app:strokeColor="#2196F3" app:strokeWidth="1dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="12dp" android:text="다음 단계: AI가 귀하의 프로젝트를 분석하여 가장 중요한 3가지 리스크를 제안합니다." android:textColor="#1976D2" android:textSize="13sp" /> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<Space android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" />
<!-- Submit Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_submit" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:text="리스크 분석 시작" android:textSize="16sp" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:icon="@android:drawable/ic_media_play" app:iconGravity="textStart" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#FAFAFA" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingHorizontal="24dp" android:paddingTop="32dp" android:paddingBottom="32dp">
<!-- Header --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="64dp" android:layout_height="64dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#DBEAFE" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="0dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_input_add" android:contentDescription="프로젝트 추가" app:tint="#2563EB" /> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="프로젝트 정보 입력" android:textColor="#111827" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:lineSpacingMultiplier="1.3" android:text="분석할 프로젝트나 아이디어를\n자세히 설명해주세요" android:textColor="#6B7280" android:textSize="14sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Project Title --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:text="프로젝트 제목 *" android:textColor="#374151" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/til_title" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxStrokeColor="#D1D5DB" app:hintEnabled="false">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="예: 온라인 교육 플랫폼 런칭" android:inputType="text" android:maxLines="2" android:paddingVertical="16dp" android:textColor="#111827" android:textColorHint="#9CA3AF" android:textSize="15sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Project Description --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:text="프로젝트 설명 *" android:textColor="#374151" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/til_description" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxStrokeColor="#D1D5DB" app:hintEnabled="false">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="top" android:hint="프로젝트의 목표, 대상 고객, 주요 기능 등을 구체적으로 작성해주세요." android:inputType="textMultiLine" android:maxLines="6" android:minHeight="160dp" android:paddingVertical="16dp" android:textColor="#111827" android:textColorHint="#9CA3AF" android:textSize="15sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:text="상세할수록 더 정확한 리스크 분석이 가능합니다" android:textColor="#6B7280" android:textSize="13sp" />
<!-- Project Budget --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:text="투입 예산 (만원) *" android:textColor="#374151" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/til_budget" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxStrokeColor="#D1D5DB" app:hintEnabled="false" app:suffixText="만원">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_budget" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="5000" android:inputType="numberDecimal" android:maxLines="1" android:paddingVertical="16dp" android:textColor="#111827" android:textColorHint="#9CA3AF" android:textSize="15sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:text="실패 시 예상 손실을 계산하는 데 사용됩니다" android:textColor="#6B7280" android:textSize="13sp" />
<!-- Info Card --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#EFF6FF" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="0dp" app:strokeColor="#BFDBFE" app:strokeWidth="1dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:lineSpacingMultiplier="1.3" android:padding="16dp" android:text="다음 단계: AI가 귀하의 프로젝트를 분석하여 가장 중요한 3가지 리스크를 제안합니다." android:textColor="#1E40AF" android:textSize="13sp" /> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Submit Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_submit" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:backgroundTint="#EF4444" android:elevation="0dp" android:enabled="false" android:text="리스크 분석 시작" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:cornerRadius="12dp" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.Risk" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar"> <!-- Primary brand color. --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/purple_200</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/purple_700</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/black</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/teal_200</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/teal_200</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/black</item> <!-- Status bar color. --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">?attr/colorPrimaryVariant</item> <!-- Customize your theme here. --> </style> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <resources> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.Risk" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.NoActionBar"> <!-- Primary brand color. --> <item name="colorPrimary">#EF4444</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">#DC2626</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/white</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">#3B82F6</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">#2563EB</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/white</item> <!-- Status bar color. --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">#111827</item> <!-- Customize your theme here. --> </style> </resources>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.Risk" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar"> <!-- Primary brand color. --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/purple_500</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/purple_700</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/white</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/teal_200</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/teal_700</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/black</item> <!-- Status bar color. --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">?attr/colorPrimaryVariant</item> <!-- Customize your theme here. --> </style> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.Risk" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.NoActionBar"> <!-- Primary brand color. --> <item name="colorPrimary">#EF4444</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">#DC2626</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/white</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">#3B82F6</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">#2563EB</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/white</item> <!-- Status bar color. --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">@android:color/white</item> <item name="android:windowLightStatusBar">true</item> <!-- Customize your theme here. --> </style> </resources>
